title: The Nile Rediscovered
inclusions_evidence: VIP Meet and assistance prior to immigration at Cairo Airport
Egyptian Visa for US, Canadian, New Zealand, Australian and UK Passport holders
Accommodation in selected category with private facilities 2N Cairo Pyramids area; 7N Nile Cruise; 2N Cairo downtown area
Breakfast daily; all meals on Nile Cruise
Private Egyptologist guide and sightseeing in Cairo
Small group guided sightseeing on the Nile Cruise
Upgraded entry to the Valley of the Kings including entrance to Tutunkhamun's and Ramses VI Tombs

hotel.name_or_hint: Cairo Pyramids area and downtown Cairo

other.notes: Costs for guided tours and entrance fees are estimated based on similar packages.

reasoning: The travel agency deal includes extensive inclusions such as flights, accommodations, meals, and guided tours, making it significantly cheaper than booking everything separately.
additional_notes: This deal offers a comprehensive experience with a high level of service.
